page.title: 06FORDHAM BALLET CLASSES
page.content: A ballet class is held every Saturday in the village hall. It starts at 9.00am and finishes at 11.30am. In that time there are three classes. In the first class there are 18 people, in the second class there are 23 people and in the third class there are 9 people. It costs 75p for 3/4 hour. The main branches are at Rayne and Braintree. The class does tap and ballet dancing.The ballet dancing is working for grade1 and the tap dancing is working for primary grade. In order to dance you need a special outfit.It is a leotard with a skirt, leg warmers, back cross-over cardigan and a hair band.You start off with a warm-up to loosen all your muscles. This is followed by practices of particular dances. At the last lesson of term parents are invited to watch.
